name: A Cheerful Tour Guide?
text:
Well then, once again—
Welcome to the Galaxy Carnival Expo!!

name: A Cheerful Tour Guide?
text:
Together with me,
let's make this the happiest event ever!

options.text: Um, thank you for the welcome?
It might be a little over the top...?
Also, your banner is upside down...

name: A Cheerful Tour Guide?
text:
Ah, huh...?
Could it be, this isn't how everyone
gives a welcome in Japan?

As [Player] nods,
the young man, shoulders slumped in disappointment,
quickly takes down the banner and turns back.

name: A Cheerful Tour Guide?
text:
Um... I messed up a little, but
this will be a good memory, right!?
Well then, shall we go!

options.text: P-Please wait a minute!
First, please introduce yourself...
Could you be the person Roudin-san mentioned...

name: A Cheerful Tour Guide?
text:
An introduction... Ahh!?
Sorry! I was writing your name on the banner,
so I felt like I already knew you!

name: Turbak
text:
Nice to meet you, I'm Turbak.
I'm a hero belonging to S&S Heroes.
It's nice to meet you, [Player]-kun!

name: Turbak
text:
I've heard about you from Roudin-san and Barrel-kun.
Thank you for accepting the request!

options.text: It's a pleasure to meet you too!
He seems a little air-headed...?
I kinda like the wild feeling...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Um, I don't really get it, but...
If something about me made you happy, I'm really glad!

name: Turbak
text:
They're both checking the setup
at the pavilion right now.

name: Turbak
text:
While we head over to their place,
let me explain the event and
talk a little about myself.

In response to [Player]'s greeting,
Turbak beams, raises his tour flag,
and starts walking.

name: Turbak
text:
Once again, welcome to GCE!
As I'm sure you've heard, this event lets you
experience festivals from all over the galaxy!

name: Turbak
text:
There are nearly 50 exhibitors, famous and unknown.
Maybe there's a festival that you're familiar with
participating as well.

name: Turbak
text:
You'll have plenty of free time, so
I'd be happy if you could enjoy yourself
in between work—Ah, that's right!

As he says, Turbak waves
the tour flag in his hand,
puffs out his chest, and beams.

name: Turbak
text:
If you want to know more about the festivals,
just let me know! It's a part of my job,
so I'm familiar with festivals from all over!

options.text: Part of your job?
Come to think of it, that flag...
Ah, I think I get it now.

name: Turbak
text:
Ahaha, it must have been pretty obvious.
I work for a company called Mercury Tours
as a tour conductor.

name: Turbak
text:
I've attended most of the festivals
exhibiting this time as an attendant, so
I think I can explain them properly!

name: Turbak
text:
So, if you get interested in a festival
at this event, I'd love for you to
visit the actual place!

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, my company told me to advertise...
...If you'd like to book a tour,
please use our company, Mercury Tours!

options.text: I'll be sure to do that!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you, I'm so happy!
Well then, I'll have to do my best to guide you so you get interested!

options.text: You're a very serious person, aren't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh... This kind of sales-like work isn't my strong suit.
B-But!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I really want you to enjoy the event.
That feeling is genuine.
So, I'll do my best to guide you!

options.text: It really feels like you're being forced to say that...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ugh... This kind of sales-like work isn't my strong suit.
B-But!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I really want you to enjoy the event.
That feeling is genuine.
So, I'll do my best to guide you!

name: Turbak
text:
Well then, first, let me explain
about this place, the Japan Pavilion.
But, I suppose—

name: Turbak
text:
You know more about Japan than I do,
so I guess I'll just talk about
the concept of this pavilion.

options.text: It's not about a specific festival, right?
Things that are usually at Japanese festivals...
It's a reproduction of a festival stall area, right?

text:
Nodding at [Player]'s words,
Turbak starts walking with a smile
and introduces the surrounding stalls.

name: Turbak
text:
As you have said, the main reproduction
here is the festival stalls.
Originally, it was a custom unique to festivals—

name: Turbak
text:
To say the least, special rituals, or dances.
I think we'd have to reproduce
those kinds of things as well.

name: Turbak
text:
There are surprisingly few
nationwide festivals in Japan, right?
Even though there are a lot of festivals.

name: Turbak
text:
We can't reproduce all of them,
so we decided to let people experience
the common atmosphere.

options.text: Now that you mention it, most festivals are regional.
What's the highlight of this pavilion?
(He's a proper tour conductor...)

name: Turbak
text:
The highlight is definitely this festival stall area!
...Ah, speaking of festival stalls,
I heard an interesting story!

name: Turbak
text:
In your language, a festival means
a day that has a connection to something, right?
That mixed with the festival customs—

name: Turbak
text:
You'd also call the food stalls a 'festival'.
You'd even call the stalls at campus
events and such that as well, right?

縁日 (ennichi / related day): day associated with a deity
in modern days, it became more of a generalized term for festivals,
because festival themings and such
do take my words with an ocean of salt though

name: Turbak
text:
I love learning about the
customs that the local people have
created over time like this!

name: Turbak
text:
Oops, sorry.
I got sidetracked, so,
let me introduce to you the stalls...

Just as Turbak was about to introduce the stalls,
familiar figures in the line of sight of the two
were waving with smiles.

name: Barrel
text:
[Player]-san!
Over here, over here!!
Maaan, I was tired of waiting~!!

name: Roudin
text:
Yo, long trip... well, not really,
but good work out there.
First of all, I'm glad you arrived safely.

options.text: Good work to you too, you two!
Barrel, you look like you're having fun!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course~!
As you can see, I'm at full throttle, it's super fun~!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
These permanent festival stalls has nothing not to be excited about~!
It's like I can hear the sound of taiko drums~!

options.text: Roudin-san, were you able to study up on Japan?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I've been with Barrel the whole time, so I think I've gotten to know it pretty well?
About the festivals, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Japan's unique stage magic, stage production, and various other things are really interesting.
I'm enjoying myself.

text:
In response to [Player]'s words,
the two smile, and Turbak puts away
his flag and calls out to them with a smile.

name: Turbak
text:
Good work, you two!
I was just about to introduce
the stalls to [Player]-kun here.

name: Barrel
text:
That's a nice timing~!
The final check is done,
so we can open anytime~!!

name: Roudin
text:
We were rushing to set up,
so I was a little worried,
but I'm glad we made it in time.

name: Turbak
text:
All the staff really worked hard.
I hope the people who came
to visit will enjoy it!

name: Barrel
text:
I'm super confident about that~!
Takoyaki, yakisoba, cotton candy,
shooting galleries, masks, and water balloons—

name: Barrel
text:
Ah, it's such a perfect lineup
that it makes my head spin. It'd be a lie
if I said I weren't satisfied~!

As Barrel says, he waves his hand behind him,
and in the direction of his gaze, the stall staff he had
befriended in this short time wave back with a smile.

name: Roudin
text:
Still, there are a lot of
different kinds of stalls in Japan.
It's quite different from the festivals I know.

options.text: Come to think of it, Roudin-san...
Where are you from?
Roudin-san, your childhood!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text: What, even I have memories of my childhood, you know.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Well, after I discovered magic, I pretty much only remember practicing and performing on stage.

name: Roudin
text:
I'm from America, on Earth.
Well, it was a tourist spot,
so it was more like an event than a festival.

name: Roudin
text:
It wasn't rooted in local customs...
So it wasn't that kind of atmosphere.
Oh, come to think of it, when I was a kid—

name: Roudin
text:
I used to run a lemonade stand
to earn some pocket money.
With my parents' permission, of course.
Ah, how nostalgic.

As he says, Roudin smiles with narrowed eyes,
as if he is reminiscing about the past.
Barrel looks at him with a surprised expression.

name: Barrel
text:
Eeeh!?
Roudin-san, you're from America~?
Me too! I'm from America too~!!

name: Roudin
text:
What, Barrel, we're from the same place?
Then, did you also have lemonade when you were
a kid... No, that would depend on the region.

name: Roudin
text:
I'm from Nevada, what about you?
If you're a gunbearer hero,
you must be from the west, right?

name: Barrel
text:
Texas~!
We saw a lot of lemonade
stands in our area too~!

name: Barrel
text:
But, I'm from a place with
a pretty bad public safety record...
My parents wouldn't give me permission~.

name: Turbak
text:
So you're not from this country, Barrel.
You're so knowledgeable about Japanese festivals,
I even thought you were from Japan.

name: Barrel
text:
Ah, about that~!
My grandma lives in Japan~.
And, when I came to Japan as a kid—

name: Barrel
text:
She took me to a festival
in her hometown, and I got
hooked on it right away~!

name: Barrel
text:
After I came to Orient City to become a
police officer, I've been participating
in the local festivals every year~.

name: Turbak
text:
Memories with your family...
If you're that hooked on festivals, it must have been
a really happy experience for you, Barrel!

name: Barrel
text:
—Yeah~, something like that~!
Thanks to that, I'm now
Orient City's number one festival man~!

name: Barrel
text:
Now, to everyone who came to the event,
I'm going to show them just how great
the Japan Pavilion is~!!

name: Turbak
text:
Ahaha!
That's reassuring,
I'm counting on you, Barrel-kun!

options.text: Yo, Festival Man!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Waha, thanks~!
[Player]-san, I'll make sure you have a great time too~!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, hey, it's great to be enthusiastic, but save some energy for the main event, okay?
We're just getting to the specifics now.

options.text: I'll do my best too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, let's do our best together!
Let's give all the people who came to the event the best happy memories!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, hey, it's great to be enthusiastic, but save some energy for the main event, okay?
We're just getting to the specifics now.

options.text: How exactly are we going to liven it up now?

text:
Roudin smiles as he watches the excited group,
and when things have calmed down,
he starts to cut to the chase about their future actions.

name: Roudin
text:
Well then, let me get down to the specifics.
It's about how we're going to attract
customers to the Japan Pavilion—

name: Barrel
text:
Like running around during the event and advertising~?
I'm pretty confident in my leg strength~!

name: Roudin
text:
That's reassuring, Barrel.
If the method I'm about to talk about
doesn't work, I'll be counting on you.

name: Turbak
text:
Everyone, you all know that this GCE event
is organized by our agency, S&S Heroes, right?

After confirming that the group nodded at
Turbak's words, Roudin continues,
taking over from him.

name: Roudin
text:
Well, to be precise, it's co-hosted
with the Archimedes Colony.
But in terms of management, it's pretty much the same.

name: Roudin
text:
This time, we're using our position as the
management to launch an advertising project.
Specifically, a collaboration stream.

name: Turbak
text:
That's right, a collaboration stream!
Um, I forgot why, but apparently
it has a great effect in advertising!

name: Roudin
text:
Hey... We just had a meeting about
the details of that in the office, didn't we?

name: Turbak
text:
S-Sorry...
I was so focused on studying each pavilion
that I wasn't listening properly.

name: Roudin
text:
Well, getting to know the other
pavilions is also important.
I don't really mind that.

options.text: Um... In short.
You mean you're collaborating with other pavilions?

name: Roudin
text:
Oops, I got sidetracked. My bad.
As you said, we'll be streaming
with heroes from other pavilions.

name: Roudin
text:
The quality of the Japan Pavilion is pretty high.
Once people start flowing in, it will spread
by itself and we can expect more visitors.

name: Barrel
text:
So, what we need now is
promotion to attract people
in the first place~!

name: Roudin
text:
That's right, Barrel.
We have heroes to become poster
boys in each of our pavilions.

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, I get it now!
The heroes will introduce each other's
pavilions and stream it!

Roudin nods at the words of the two
and continues to speak while checking
the device in his hand.

name: Roudin
text:
It was a last-minute project,
so it was pretty tough to coordinate,
but I managed to secure a decent number of slots.

name: Roudin
text:
It's like we're creating a corner
to introduce each other's pavilions
before and after the exhibition match.

name: Turbak
text:
An exhibition match on the main stage,
and a collaboration stream to go with it.
Yeah, that sounds like it'll be great promotion!

name: Roudin
text:
So, [Player],
what do you think about it?
About this collaboration stream—

name: Roudin
text:
It wasn't in the original request.
It's to support the exhibition match,
so you can choose to partake or not.

name: Roudin
text:
But, well, if you do participate,
we'll give you an additional reward.
President Huckle said to leave it up to you.

name: Turbak
text:
I'd rather you be with us, if possible.
Leave the guiding of other pavilions
to me, I've studied properly!

options.text: In that case, please let me have a hand!
If President says it's okay...
I don't have anything else to do, so...

name: Roudin
text:
Haha, thanks.
If you're with us,
it's going to be a fun stream.

name: Barrel
text:
Whoa, yes~!
That means I'll be with [Player]-san
throughout the event~!

name: Turbak
text:
Well then, let's get going.
Leave the guiding to me, I have the
entire venue map in my head!

The group starts walking, led by Turbak,
and as they walk, various pavilions
show their respective forms.

And Turbak stops walking
and looks back at the group.
In front of [Player]—

Chapter 2:
Lunalight Carnival

The moment they entered the pavilion,
the entire area switched to night,
and a starry sky spread out above them.

There, the landscape of the festival that
they remembered from a previous request
was reproduced exactly as it was.

options.text: Eh, this place is...
Clouge!?
I've seen this place somewhere before...

name: Turbak
text:
We've arrived!
This is our first collaboration stream partner,
Clouge's Luna Festival!

As he says with a smile, Turbak
continues his explanation, showing
his true value as a tour conductor.

name: Turbak
text:
A planet in the Sunflower Galaxy,
the city of Clouge.
It's famous for its clothing.

name: Turbak
text:
In this city, once a year,
they've cherished a star called Luna that
approaches and can be seen in the night sky.

name: Turbak
text:
They cherish the night sky that holds Luna,
and dance in new clothes under the faint light.
That's how the Luna Festival is said to have begun.

name: Roudin
text:
I see... Hey, Turbak,
have you already figured out about
all the festivals for each pavilion?

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, of course!
Festival aren't the only thing in them.
They have history, and human culture at that.

name: Turbak
text:
I want people to get interested in this event
and want them to enjoy the local festivals.
To those people—

name: Turbak
text:
For them to enjoy the festival to their fullest,
and for them to make the happiest memories.
That's what I'll help them fulfill!

Turbak's explanation continues without pause,
and as it comes to a conclusion,
a person who approached the group calls out.

name: Astosis
text:
Thank you for the detailed explanation.
Fufu, with this, it seems
there's no need for me to step in.

name: Yohack
text:
I'm surprised, you've alrady known so much!
Thank you for being so
interested in our pavilion!!

options.text: Astosis-san, it's been a while!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astosis
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It has been a while, [Player]-kun.
I heard through the agency that you would be here, but I'm happy to see you like this.

options.text: Yohack-san, long time no see!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you for your help in Enoshima!
I'm so happy to see you again so soon!

options.text: It's really lively!

name: Astosis
text:
Thankfully, the Clouge Pavilion has far more
guests visiting than we expected.

name: Yohack
text:
It makes me so happy that so many people
get to see our hometown's festival!

As the three of them exchange greetings,
more familiar voices call out to them.

name: Maculata
text:
Oh my, the city of Clouge is
very hot right now, you know?
Lately, it's not just about fashion...

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Fabric products in general are a hot topic.
We also use their sheets
and curtains at our inn.

options.text: Nessen-san, it's been a while!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Nessen (Masquerade)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm glad to see you're doing well, [Player]-sama.
I'm very happy to see you.

options.text: Maculata-san, you're participating too!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Maculata
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I kept it a secret when I got the request for the Parallel-Que.
A little surprise, yes.

options.text: Amazing, everyone's here!

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
To everyone from the Japan Pavilion,
and [Player]-sama.
Thank you for your cooperation this time.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Originally, within our agency, I, who am
familiar with Japan, should have
been the one to help the pavilion...

name: Roudin
text:
You got the request from Clouge first,
so don't worry too much about it.
...Well, introductions first.

At Roudin's words,
the heroes from the two pavilions
greet each other.

options.text: By the way, I've been wondering,
Nessen-san, that suit is...

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Ah, this outfit?
The suit that I had [Player]-sama
observe in Clouge before—

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
From the stream footage,
Maculata-sama recreated that
hero suit into an outfit.

name: Maculata
text:
Fufu, if you're going to enjoy a festival,
you have to go all out with your attire!
It's a perfect reproduction, isn't it?

name: Barrel
text:
You all look great~!
Is this festival the kind of place where
everyone wears different outfits~?

name: Roudin
text:
Well, let's tell the viewers about that.
It's almost time for the stream.

After confirming that the group had nodded,
Roudin turns to the stream drone arranged by
S&S Heroes with a smile.

name: Roudin
text:
To all our viewers!
Welcome to the biggest festival event on the moon,
the Galaxy Carnival Expo!

name: Roudin
text:
The Summer Festa on Earth is over,
and the festival mood is over...
Is that what you're thinking?

name: Roudin
text:
Here on the moon, the festivities lives on!
All the festivals from all over the galaxy,
and the heroes are making it super exciting!

name: Roudin
text:
In this stream, the heroes from each
pavilion will be casually introducing
their pavilions, yes?

Roudin continues the stream cheerfully and confidently.
After confirming that the screen at the edge of his vision
was lively, he turns it over to another hero.

name: Roudin
text:
First up, Clouge's Luna Festival.
Well then, Astosis, can you briefly
explain for us about this festival?

name: Astosis
text:
Ah, yes. Leave it to me, Roudin-san.
Now, before we enjoy the festival,
first, about the history of Clouge...

name: Yohack
text:
W-W-Wait a minute!
Astosis-san, if you talk about all that,
it would take up the entire stream!

name: Turbak
text:
Is that so?
I'm very interested, so I think
it would be fun to listen to...

name: Barrel
text:
Hmm, that may be so~, but
if possible, I'd like to know
the highlights of the festival~!

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
I would be delighted to do so.
We've prepared a lot of historical materials
in the pavilion's exhibition space.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
If that may caught your eye,
please have yourselves a look at that.
For now, let's talk about the highlights of the festival.

After his words, Nessen looks back
at the cityscape behind him and
guides the group into the clamor.

name: Maculata
text:
When you think of Clouge,
you can't possibly miss the fashion!
Now, won't you take a closer look?

name: Yohack
text:
There are lots of workshops in Clouge,
and everyone brings their prized works
to show off at the festival!

name: Yohack
text:
Everything is a handmade, one-of-a-kind item,
so just by looking around the stalls,
you might find a great treasure!

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Of course, it's not just clothes.
Corsages, scarves, neckties.
Not just fabric products like that—

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Leather goods such as bags, precious metal accessories,
and various other things... It's truly
a festival of craftsmanship.

Listening to the words of the heroes from
the Clouge Pavilion, the heroes from the
Japan Pavilion go around the stalls.

name: Barrel
text:
Eh, is this lace tablecloth
all handmade~!?
Wow, maybe I'll buy one for Grandma...

name: Roudin
text:
The embroidery on this suit is also magnificent.
I'd like to order this for a
costume for when I'm on a big stage.

name: Turbak
text:
They're all really amazing...
Hey, why is craftsmanship
so popular in Clouge?

The heroes raise their voices in admiration.
And, to Turbak, who raised a question,
Astosis replies.

name: Astosis
text:
Ah, about that.
It comes from the dress considered to be the
greatest masterpiece in the history of this city, Pauderna.

name: Turbak
text:
Ah, I've researched on that!
It's considered the treasure of Clouge,
and it's only shown on special occasions, right?

name: Astosis
text:
That's right, Turbak-san.
It's a very special thing, for this city...
And for me as well.

As Astosis says, the complicated expression
that momentarily appeared on his face disappears,
and he smiles at Turbak.

name: Astosis
text:
A dress that rivals Pauderna,
and a dress that surpasses it.
For that, the artisans hone their skills every day.

name: Yohack
text:
And while everyone was working hard,
the city of Clouge became famous for
its clothing, right!?

name: Barrel
text:
Wow... That's so cool~!
It's like, the spirit of craftsmanship!

name: Astosis
text:
Spirit... I see, that's a good word.
After Clouge opened up to other stars,
a lot of things have changed.

name: Astosis
text:
But even so, they still love Luna,
pay respect to Pauderna,
and devote themselves to craftsmanship.

name: Yohack
text:
Yes!
I believe those core aspects
will never change!

name: Turbak
text:
...Something that never changes,
no matter how much it changes, huh?

name: Turbak
text:
Thank you for telling me, you two.
Everyone watching this stream, and me too!
We've all come to love Clouge!

Turbak, who had a fleeting look of sadness on his face,
quickly erases that expression and expresses
his gratitude with a smile.

name: Maculata
text:
About that Pauderna...
To go along with this event,
a replica is on display, you know?

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Yes, it's normally only exhibited once every ten-odd years,
but we're reproducing it at the pavilion.
And that's not all there is of it.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
We're also holding a special event to go
along with the Pauderna exhibit, a masquerade.
Would you all like to see it?

name: Turbak
text:
Is that really alright!?
I'd love to participate!
It sounds like it'll be the happiest memory!

Turbak nods at Nessen's invitation,
and Barrel and Roudin nod as well.
The group then heads to the venue.

A sparkling chandelier with intricate decorations,
antique furniture, a lot of people.
The group gasps at the gorgeous party room.

name: Barrel
text:
I-I don't really get it...
But I can tell that this
place is amazing...!

name: Roudin
text:
And this is just a reproduction, right?
I wonder how elaborate the
actual venue would be...

name: Astosis
text:
Fufu, the residents of the city got really
excited about participating in this event.
It turned out better than we expected.

name: Yohack
text:
They said they wouldn't let it be called just a replica,
so all the workshops worked really hard!

name: Maculata
text:
Fufu, the Pauderna replica is also
a wonderful work that rivals the original.
Wouldn't you take a look?

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
We're also holding a masquerade, so
when you're not viewing, please enjoy the food,
music, and dancing to your heart's content.

After seeing off Nessen and the others
who start to lead the way,
Roudin turns around and smiles at [Player].

name: Roudin
text:
Sorry that it's turned into just sightseeing.
[Player], if you'd like, why don't you
invite someone and enjoy the masquerade?

name: Roudin
text:
We'll keep the stream going with the rest of us.
Since you went to the trouble of coming along,
it'd be a waste not to make some memories, right?

options.text: I'm having plenty of fun, though...
Hmm, if you say so.
Since I'm here, I might as well enjoy it!
(Invite Roudin)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, am I just the person?
I'm the one who suggested it, but I'd be happy to accompany you.

As he says that, Roudin smiles and holds out his hand to [Player].
A single rose was in his hand.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, it's an artificial flower I bought at that stall earlier.
Pretty good for an escort, right?
...Well, something like that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-sama.
Will you dance a song with this Roudin?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, don't worry about whether you can dance or not.
This kind of thing is fun just by moving to the music.
Taking [Player]'s hand, Roudin starts walking to the dance floor.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, nice. That's the spirit.
You've got pretty good fundamentals, you know?

The two of them sway their bodies to the music.
And then, suddenly, Roudin whispers to [Player] with a serious face.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Thanks, [Player].
For going along with my unreasonable request.
To be honest—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I've only just returned to being a hero, so I don't have many connections or achievements.
This is a big job that came my way.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...And, when it came to asking an Operator at the pavilion, your face was the first one that came to mind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I thought that with you, I could somehow manage, I thought so without any basis.
That's why—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah... Let me say it now.
I'm happy to be able to work with you again.
I'm counting on you again, [Player].
As he says, Roudin, in an attempt to hide his crimson cheeks, shows off his steps fiercely.
In the gorgeous space, amidst the quietly echoing music, the masquerade time passed peacefully.

options.text: (Invite Barrel)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san!
Over here, over here~!
This is some amazing grub~!!
[Player] looks for Barrel, and at that moment, a cheerful voice calls out to them.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I've never seen any of this food before~.
I don't really go to other stars, so I'm getting a little excited~!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Now, now, [Player]-san!
Since we're here, let's eat everything in sight~!
As Barrel says, he devours the lined-up dishes, and when he finds a dish he likes, he picks it up and offers it to [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Whoa, this is delicious~!
As expected of me for accepting the dispatch, my judgment is too genius~!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text: I volunteered pretty much on impulse, saying that I loved Japanese festivals, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Like this, with everyone at the Japan Pavilion, preparing it, and promoting it.
And, to enjoy a festival from a distant star~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text: I don't really know what to say, the event has just started, but I've been excited the whole time~!
As he says, his tail wags excitedly, and Barrel beams at [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
So, it's may be work, but...
Let's enjoy it to the fullest together~,
[Player]-san!
Nodding at [Player], Barrel smiles broadly again and reaches for the lined-up dishes.
Amidst the music and clamor echoing in the gorgeous space, the masquerade time passed peacefully.

name: Turbak
text:
[Player]-kun!
Thank the stars, I thought I'd lost sight of you.
So, are you enjoying the festival?

After that, as [Player] was walking alone,
with a cheerful smile,
Turbak's voice calls out.

name: Turbak
text:
Clouge's Masquerade, huh?
I'd seen it in the documents, but experiencing it
in person is completely different!

name: Turbak
text:
[Player]-kun, you've experienced
this festival at its home, right?

name: Turbak
text:
And it's not just Clouge, you've had a
hand in various festivals on various stars.
I heard from Roudin-san and the others.

As he says that, Turbak
looks straight at [Player]'s face
and continues to speak.

name: Turbak
text:
I've also been around various
stars as a tour conductor.
Everywhere was memorable!

name: Turbak
text:
Hey, if you have time, can you
tell me about your memories?

name: Turbak
text:
Happy memories become even
happier if you share them, right!?
And not just that—

name: Turbak
text:
Even if it's a painful memory,
I'd like you to tell me, if you don't mind.
If I take on half of it, it might become easier, right?

As he says and smiles, Turbak
holds out his hand to [Player].

name: Turbak
text:
It might be work, but since we're
sharing the same memories like this...
I'd like to become good friends with you!

Taking [Player]'s hand,
Turbak starts walking into
the clamor of the people—

And so, the heroes who finished the stream
in success head to the special stage to
participate in the exhibition match.

options.text: The special stage is Japanese-styled.
More people came than I thought.
It's not entirely sold out, though.

name: Turbak
text:
This event is hosted by the Japan Pavilion.
So the stage is also Japanese-themed.

name: Barrel
text:
The location is also adjacent
to the Japan Pavilion~.
The customers are coming~!

name: Roudin
text:
I guess it can't be a full house.
The advertising effects won't just appear overnight.
...Now, from here on out, it's another surprise!!

Barrel also nods at Roudin's words,
and the two of them hold out their
Parallel-Ques and smile at [Player].

options.text: Well then, let's unveil it!
Transformation, approved!
I can finally do my job!

text:
The dazzling transformation light subsides.
And, in their line of sight, the two of them were
wearing suits inspired by the festival.

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Yeeeah!
It's just as I imagined~, it's so cool~!
Arrest, you're under arrest, just kidding~!

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
It's a suit that looks great on stage,
though not as cool as Barrel's.
...I don't really get this bow, though.

options.text: I don't really get it either...
That's also the form of your dreams.
I'm sure there's some meaning to it.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Haha, I'll figure it out as I use it.
This uplifting feeling... I wonder if Lilac
and the others in Aguarica felt like this.

name: Turbak
text:
I'd heard about it, but I'm surprised...
To think you can really transform
in a suit that's different from usual!

name: Turbak
text:
Oops, this isn't the time to be impressed.
[Player]-kun, can I ask you
to transform me too?

options.text: Of course, here I go!
Turbak-san's transformation, approved!
Let's make it exciting!

name: (Mobile Device)
text:
—Connect path?
To start operation,
please tap 'OK'.

note: every day I'm surprised by how elaborate they decided to make this animation

options.text: OK

name: Turbak
text:
Thank you, [Player]-kun.
Well then, let's head to the stage.
Let's make happy memories together!

The group heads to the stage,
and the heroes from the Clouge Pavilion
call out to them.

name: Yohack
text:
Um... [Player]-san!
Please, can you let us
transform into our other forms too?

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
If it's a suit that's different from usual,
I think we can provide our guests with
a surprise and a topic of conversation.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
We also want to liven up
the event as much as you do.
Please, we ask you!

options.text: In that case, leave it to me!
If it's come to this, I'll take care of everyone!
Approved! Approved!! Approved!!!

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
Thank you for your cooperation.
With this form that you have observed,
we will do our best to entertain you!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Hehe, leave it to me!
Together with everyone, we'll make
this stage super exciting!

name: Maculata
text:
Fufu, I agree with that.
We'll be going all out, yes?

name: Astosis
text:
Fufu, to think the day would come when the
four of us could stand on the same stage.
I'm glad I participated in this event.

The heroes of Clouge laugh together,
and Roudin calls out to them.

name: Roudin (Stella Link)
text:
Looks like we're all ready.
Well then, shall we go,
for our dear audience is waiting, no?

name: Barrel (Stella Link)
text:
Waha—!
I'm getting excited~!
Everyone, let's give it our all~!!

name: Turbak
text:
Let's go, everyone!
Let's make it a happy stage that
connects everyone who came and us!
Battle Start

The heroes finished the exhibition match
in success. They move, still excited—

To do the second half of the collaboration stream,
they had arrived at the Japan Pavilion.

name: Roudin
text:
Good work, that was a great stage.
It was pretty exciting, wasn't it?

name: Turbak
text:
[Player], too, thank you for the
observation and operation.
It was a lot of fun!

name: Barrel
text:
The new suit is so exciting~!
Ugh~, I can't wait for
the next stage~!!

options.text: Barrel, your suit was cool!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Barrel
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thanks~ [Player]-san!
Sui-san gave form to the super cool suit I thought up~!

options.text: Roudin-san, that suit is...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Roudin
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, it looks great on stage, doesn't it!
...What's with that face, was it a little too exciting for you?

options.text: Turbak-san, your suit is so stimulating...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Turbak
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I-Is that so?
I wasn't really aware of it, so it's a little embarrassing to be told that.

text:
And so, with the excitement of the stage
still fresh, they start the stream
to introduce the Japan Pavilion.

name: Turbak
text:
To all our viewers, from here on,
we'll be introducing the Japan Pavilion!
Please look forward to it!

With Turbak's words as a signal,
the heroes enjoy the stalls
as they please.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
This is my first time seeing
the completed Japan Pavilion, but...
The level of reproduction here is incredible.

name: Nessen (Masquerade)
text:
If only there was a public bath... Turbak-sama.
How about setting up a sento in that
empty space... or at least a footbath?

name: Maculata
text:
Oh, isn't that lovely.
When it's completed, maybe
I'll drop by too.

name: Turbak
text:
Ahaha, I'm sure Japan has a
thriving bath culture, right?
Leave it to me, I'll figure something out!

name: Roudin
text:
Hey, hey, Turbak.
Are you sure you can fulfill such a promise?
...Well, let's consider it together later.

In front of the empty space, Nessen's
eyes sparkle as he makes a proposal—

name: Astosis
text:
W-What is this dish called?
The brown object, um...
It seems to be moving.

name: Barrel
text:
Ah, that's okonomiyaki~!
That moving thing is bonito flakes...

name: Roudin
text:
It's called 'dancing-eating'.
You eat the freshly prepared, fresh
ingredients while they're still moving?

oh boy

お好み焼き (okonomiyaki / stir-fried pancakes): savory pancakes made on a flat cooking surface (teppan)
you'd often see a cabbage base for this
鰹節 (katsuobushi / bonito flakes): shipjack tuna smoked and processed so well it's lighter than feathers
this cause them to move around when garnished on hot dishes, because the steam'd move them around
おどりぐい (odorigui / dance-dining): literally the 'so fresh it's alive' concept

name: Astosis
text:
...Hmm, I see.
Other stars really do have various customs.
I-I'm a little hesitant, but this is also an experience...

name: Yohack
text:
R-Roudin-san!
Please keep your jokes in moderation!
Astosis-san believes you completely!

name: Roudin
text:
Haha, my bad, my bad!
Just give it a try,
I can guarantee it's delicious?

The residents of Clouge enjoy the Japanese stall's food,
which they are seeing for the first time,
while being surprised—

name: Barrel
text:
G-Grrr...
O-One more time!!
I want one more chance~!!

name: Turbak
text:
Y-You're still going, Barrel-kun!?
Hey, this shooting gallery is a game, right?
You don't have to make it a competition...

name: Barrel
text:
That's why 10 losses in a row is related
to my dignity as a police officer~!
One more time, just one more time~!!

name: Yohack
text:
Ah, aha...
This isn't going to end for a while.
I completely understand...!

And so, the heroes who finished the stream.
Eventually, the closing time came, and the
first day of the event quietly ended.
